author: Nick Dawson
description: Silly? Absloutly, but maybe using au currant paradigmes to engage younger, tech-savvy groups could help create awareness of facts and curb the spread fo fear, uncertaintity and doubt.
summary: Have a fever? No. Then swipe left!Been in a part of the world with Ebola? No. Then swipe left!It's a match - you DON'T have Ebola!
title: Tinder for Ebola symptoms - diagnose yourself to reduce concern and learn the facts
